title.text: RFC 5871: IANA Allocation Guidelines for the IPv6 Routing Header

contents.text:
Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)                          J. Arkko
Request for Comments: 5871                                      Ericsson
Updates: 2460                                                 S. Bradner
Category: Standards Track                             Harvard University
ISSN: 2070-1721                                                 May 2010
IANA Allocation Guidelines for the IPv6 Routing Header
contents.zh-CHS: IPv6路由标头的IANA分配指南

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document specifies the IANA guidelines for allocating new values for the Routing Type field in the IPv6 Routing Header.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档指定了IANA指南，用于为IPv6路由标头中的路由类型字段分配新值。

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This is an Internet Standards Track document.
contents.zh-CHS: 这是一份互联网标准跟踪文件。

contents.text: This document is a product of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). It represents the consensus of the IETF community. It has received public review and has been approved for publication by the Internet Engineering Steering Group (IESG). Further information on Internet Standards is available in Section 2 of RFC 5741.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件是互联网工程任务组（IETF）的产品。它代表了IETF社区的共识。它已经接受了公众审查，并已被互联网工程指导小组（IESG）批准出版。有关互联网标准的更多信息，请参见RFC 5741第2节。

contents.text: Information about the current status of this document, any errata, and how to provide feedback on it may be obtained at http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5871.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关本文件当前状态、任何勘误表以及如何提供反馈的信息，请访问http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc5871.

contents.zh-CHS: 本文件受BCP 78和IETF信托有关IETF文件的法律规定的约束(http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info)自本文件出版之日起生效。请仔细阅读这些文件，因为它们描述了您对本文件的权利和限制。从本文件中提取的代码组件必须包括信托法律条款第4.e节中所述的简化BSD许可证文本，并提供简化BSD许可证中所述的无担保。

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document specifies the IANA guidelines [RFC5226] for allocating new values for the Routing Type field in the IPv6 Routing Header [RFC2460]. Previously, no IANA guidance existed for such allocations.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档规定了IANA指南[RFC5226]，用于为IPv6路由标头[RFC2460]中的路由类型字段分配新值。以前，没有IANA对此类分配的指导。

contents.text: 2. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 2. IANA考虑

contents.text: New Routing Type values are allocated through IETF Review or IESG Approval [RFC5226].
contents.zh-CHS: 通过IETF审查或IESG批准[RFC5226]分配新的路由类型值。

contents.text: Note that two experimental values (253 and 254) are already available for use [RFC4727].
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，已有两个实验值（253和254）可供使用[RFC4727]。

contents.text: 3. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 安全考虑

contents.text: This specification does not change the security properties of the Routing Header. However, past experience shows that it is easy to design routing headers that have significant problems [RFC5095].
contents.zh-CHS: 此规范不会更改路由标头的安全属性。然而，过去的经验表明，设计有重大问题的路由头是很容易的[RFC5095]。

contents.text: 4. References
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 工具书类

contents.text: 4.1. Normative References
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 规范性引用文件

contents.text: [RFC2460] Deering, S. and R. Hinden, "Internet Protocol, Version 6 (IPv6) Specification", RFC 2460, December 1998.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2460]Deering，S.和R.Hinden，“互联网协议，第6版（IPv6）规范”，RFC 2460，1998年12月。

contents.text: [RFC5226] Narten, T. and H. Alvestrand, "Guidelines for Writing an IANA Considerations Section in RFCs", BCP 26, RFC 5226, May 2008.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5226]Narten，T.和H.Alvestrand，“在RFCs中编写IANA注意事项部分的指南”，BCP 26，RFC 5226，2008年5月。

contents.text: 4.2. Informative References
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 资料性引用

contents.text: [RFC4727] Fenner, B., "Experimental Values In IPv4, IPv6, ICMPv4, ICMPv6, UDP, and TCP Headers", RFC 4727, November 2006.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC4727]Fenner，B.，“IPv4、IPv6、ICMPv4、ICMPv6、UDP和TCP报头中的实验值”，RFC 4727，2006年11月。

contents.text: [RFC5095] Abley, J., Savola, P., and G. Neville-Neil, "Deprecation of Type 0 Routing Headers in IPv6", RFC 5095, December 2007.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5095]Abley，J.，Savola，P.，和G.Neville Neil，“IPv6中0型路由头的弃用”，RFC 5095，2007年12月。

contents.text: Appendix A. Changes from RFC 2460
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.RFC 2460的变更

contents.text: This document specifies only the IANA rules associated with the Routing Type field.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档仅指定与路由类型字段关联的IANA规则。
